
# Soulbase: Empowering Creators, Authenticating Originality

Soulbase is a social media platform designed for content creators, ensuring content ownership and credit for original work. It uses NFT-based content authenticity to ensure uniqueness and traceability on the blockchain. Soulbase addresses the issue of lack of proper credit for creators by minting content as NFTs. The platform uses advanced AI technologies for image processing to enhance content quality and authenticity.

Soulbase prioritizes protecting creator rights and originality, ensuring their work is not used without proper attribution or compensation. The platform's user-friendly interface is accessible for creators of all skill levels. Soulbase also focuses on community building, allowing creators to connect, collaborate, and engage with their audience.

## Features

 ‚õìÔ∏è single-chain Connectivity of NFTs in "Polygon zkEVM Testnet"

 3Ô∏è‚É£There Are 3 Components: 1. Issuer: Idealy Controlled by The Government Body, which regulates AAdhaar Card under UIDAI, for this demonstration we have simulated the Aadhaar Card credentials.
                            2. Identity Holder: The Person Who Holds the Aadhar Card Verifible Credentials.
                            3. Verifier: The Identity will send zero knowledge proof of Verifible Credentials.

 üîé AI Content Similarity Detector: Detects Simmilarity Exsisting Content on Plaform & New Content to be poste.
                                    Disallows the posting of Content, for more than < 95 %.

 üìÑ Content Ownership: The content in creator mode is minted as an NFT to showcase user ownership

## Instructions on running project locally:

Fork and clone the project

```bash
  After forking the repo
  git clone https://github.com/Bhooomika1/soulbase
```

Install dependencies:

```bash
  cd www.soulbase/
  
  yarn install
```

Run Project on terminal

```bash
  yarn dev
```

Start the server

```bash
  http://localhost:3000
```
----
